member.name: T:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.CompareVersions
member.summary: Compares an assembly and manifest version string, logs an error and optionally fails if they don't match.

member.summary: The mod or lib's version as reported by the manifest.

member.summary: The mod or library's version as reported by the assembly.

member.summary: If enabled, this task will report a failure if the assembly version and manifest version don't match or there was a problem getting the value for either of them.

member.summary: Captures the URL for the remote origin from a git config file.

member.summary: Retrieves the branch name from the text returned by 'git status'.

member.summary: Retrieves the detatched branch name from the text returned by 'git status'.

member.summary: Text in 'git status' that indicates there are no changes in the repository to commit.

member.name: F:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetCommitInfo.UntrackedOnlyText
member.summary: Text in 'git status' that indicates there are no changes in the repository to commit, but there are untracked files.

member.summary: An object that retrieves text from the 'git' command.

member.summary: Optional: Number of characters to retrieve from the hash. Default is 7.

member.summary: Optional: If true, do not attempt to use 'git' executable.

member.summary: Optional: If true, do not attempt to check if files have been changed.

member.summary: Commit hash up to the number of characters set by .

member.summary: 'Modified' if the repository has uncommitted changes, 'Unmodified' if it doesn't. Will be left blank if unsupported (Only works if git bash is installed).

member.summary: Name of the current repository branch, if available.

member.summary: True if the branch appears to be a pull request.

member.summary: URL for the repository's origin. Null/Empty if unavailable.

member.summary: Username the repository belongs to. Null/Empty if unavailable.
